definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: guo4 yang3 hua4 ben3 jia3 xian1
sui3 guo4 yang3 hua4 wu4 mei2

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the effect of altitude on lipid peroxidation and anti-oxidation system.
sentences.chinese: 探討海拔高度對機體脂質過氧化與抗氧化系統的影響。

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide can cause fabric to discolour on contact. Use with care.
sentences.chinese: 過氧化苯可能導致織物脫色，請小心使用。

sentences.english: An amperometric biosensor for the rapid determination of the hydrogen peroxide is described.
sentences.chinese: 一種用於快速檢測過氧化氫的電流型生物傳感器。

sentences.english: A skincare mask formulated specifically for people with acne is likely to include benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid.
sentences.chinese: 有痘皮膚的面膜通常含有過氧化苯甲酰和水楊酸。

sentences.english: But benzoyl peroxide dries out skin causing itching or allergic reactions.
sentences.chinese: 但過氧化苯甲酰幹出引起皮膚瘙癢或過敏性反應。

sentences.english: Fertilization shows no significant effects on the activities of catalase and sucrase.
sentences.chinese: 施肥對蔗糖酶和過氧化氫酶活性的影響較小。

sentences.english: Insulin was labeled with horseradish peroxidase by sodium periodate oxidation method.
sentences.chinese: 用高碘酸鈉氧化法將辣根過氧化物酶標記於胰島素。

sentences.english: Objective To study peroxidative adaptive response of eukaryocyte and its mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲研究真核細胞過氧化適應反應及其可能機理。

sentences.english: Presently, Peroxidase is employed as indicator for blanching treatments of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 目前蔬菜的熱燙終點以過氧化物酶作爲指示劑來確定。

sentences.english: Inquiry into the influence of the pine-seed oil upon Lipid peroxidation of mice which are feeded on high fat feedstuff.
sentences.chinese: 探討松籽油對餵食高脂飼料小鼠脂質過氧化的影響。

sentences.english: Severe pancreatitis triggered by high fat diet and alcoholic intemperance;
sentences.chinese: 探討松籽油對餵食高脂飼料小鼠脂質過氧化的影響。
可能生成爆炸性過氧化物。

sentences.english: That something seems to be related to an enzyme called catalase.
sentences.chinese: 這種物質似乎與一種名叫過氧化氫酶的酶有關。

sentences.english: They say hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide may also help.
sentences.chinese: 他們說過氧化氫和過氧化脲也可能對此會有幫助。

sentences.english: They say hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide may also help.
sentences.chinese: 他們說過氧化氫和過氧化脲也可能對此會有幫助。

sentences.english: Scientists have found that lipofuscin formation and lipid peroxidation relevant.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們發現，脂褐素的生成與過氧化脂類有關。
